reviewText: This was a little bigger than I thought it was going to be. The feather that came on the hat was a beautiful color of black with some iridescent dark green. The Mesh netting was however squished, bent, and flattened from shipping in the packaging. It came with a clip to hold in your hair with was very strong. My hair is thin and it held it in fine. This is such a fun accessory for a costume, wedding, or themed party! I do have to disclose that I did received this product at discount in exchange for my review but it did not persuade my review of the product in anyway.
Nice item.  Worked great.

I would say this is just as cute in person as it is on the model. That was a very pleasant surprise!  The piece is well made for a fascinator, and just adorable. The geometric shapes in the netting really make this look stylish.
I recommend storing this in a hat box, or some other dust free container. This looks great new, but will be hard to clean if it isn't stored properly.
With the feathers, geometric pattern in the netting, and black coloring, this looks very sultry, sophisticated and stylish.
My 17 year old daughter spent the day wearing this after I received it, and I had to retrieve it from her room at the end of the day. She did ask to wear it to prom this year.
I think this could be worn to many different events. It would be great for a funeral of a person who loved style. It would be great for a formal dance, or to certain church functions.
It's a little sassy, and I like that.
I did receive this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This Valdler Women Girls Flower Feather Mesh Net Fascinator with Hair Pin is perfect for High Tea with my friends. I love that it makes a statement and looks elegant as well. The beautiful feathers  and rose shaped mesh give the extra touch of class! It is well constructed with a firm mesh that holds up well and is not droopy. The one thing I had a slight issue because it was shipped and the edge was bent. I had to leave an object on it for a week to get most of the kink out though in the end it looked great. Though I love collecting fascinators and wide brim hats for tea parties, I could see myself wearing this at other occasions. It's a nice size, not to big or too small! This a great accessory to add to my collection. I am very satisfied with the style, quality and price! I am so glad I was able to try this product at a discount in return for my honest and unbiased opinion.
summary: Beautiful Fascinator That would be great for High Tea!

reviewText: too small

This is definitely the largest packing cube I have ever bought! It is made of high quality material, the stitches are very nicely done. I like the mesh part on the cover of the cube, it makes my life easier when I have to look for stuff from a pile of cubes. The zippers are very high quality as well, sturdy and smoothy to open and close. I don't think you can go wrong with YKK zippers, they are the professionals. I am sure that this packing cube is machine made but it is so nice that it feels like a hand-made cube, I suppose this says a lot about the quality. I ordered the large size and I love it so much, it can fit a lot of baby clothes when I roll them up. There are two little holes on the zippers and I put on a small pendant ornament on one of them to differentiate it from other cubes I use for non-baby stuff. In all, this is a fairly good packing cube with a reasonable price. Two things make it stand out: decent size, and high-quality zipper.
summary: Good packing cube with a decent size and high-quality zipper!

reviewText: This bag was gifted to me, as it was in my wish list. Awful. DO NOT BUY. Cheap material and the smell of the purse is absolutely heinous. The bag smells of dead fish. Even soaking it in fabric softener didn't help. Not only did it come with a HORRID smell, the dimensions were incorrect. The strap was shorter and could not even reach my waist. I am 5'3. Don't waste your money.

I love this bag! I bought it because I needed a larger bag for traveling with my dog, a Pug, occasionally. You can stuff it with your stuff and theirs(food, treats, medicines). The strap is nice and wide but not so wide that it constantly slides off of your shoulder. There are 2 issues that I wish the company would take into consideration.
1). The color is supposed to be a light brown but definitely has a noticeable orange tinge. I'm keeping it because these days almost anything goes!
2) THE ZIPPERS are extremely fragile. They used a too thin zipper pull connected to the actual zipper by 2 jewelry-grade jump rings! It's obviously so flimsy! Very pretty and dainty looking. I've been lucky to be gentle and not break them as of yet, however, I will be looking for a sturdier way to replace those zipper pulls!

If you're a fan of the slouchy, hobo chic style, then this is your bag. This bag has no structure so it's very slouchy and easy-going. Since there's no shape to it, you can stuff it full of whatever you'll need without worry of it popping open or not zipping up. It comes with zipper closure and hefty shoulder strap. I was confused about the extra loops at the bottom that the strap went through, but guess what! It doubles as a backpack! Imagine my surprise, haha. It's like getting two bags in one.

The accent comes in the form of a chain and leather tassels hanging off the front to give it a little something more than your average shoulder bag. On the inside, there's two large slip pockets big enough for your phone and essentials. Of course, it comes with the signature MICOM wristlet for your cards and such. This bag is made of some sturdy material, so I'm sure it can withstand the elements of your everyday use. It has a nice subtle glossy sheen to it as well and the color is more of a vibrant orange-brown than your basic dull brown shoulder bag. A nice buy.

I received this bag in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. I gave this bag to my mom as a random gift and (pinky promise) she was ecstatic about it. She said it was the perfect size and perfect color to go with most of her clothes without being too bland like a basic white or black. Thanks for another great bag, MICOM!
Zipper broke and button came off five minutes after removing it from the package.

I usually wear a size small in tops.  After reading the reviews, I ordered a medium and am happy I did so.  A small might have worked if I wanted a very close fitting (tight) style of top...but as this is a tunic mean to be worn over leggings--a small wouldn't have worked well.  I'm 5'3" and neither sleeves nor length were too long in the medium size.  I did wash garment according to instructions prior to wearing (I always do) and it laundered well and fits perfectly.  Fabric is thin and silky and this solid color looks best with an under-layer like a long cami ( I tried wearing solo and I thought it would work, but in the end didn't love the look so much).
After several washings the material doesn't look too bad, but I have a feeling this will be a one season garment.

Ok, so I love the "#16" solid tunic tops. They're a nice, light material and hang beautifully. I'm 5'8 155lb 38-28-40. I usually wear medium tops, I ordered large for extra comfort and roominess, got just what I expected. Still flattering without being form fitting.
HOWEVER... The "#17" tie dye tops are a different material and fit. Shorter and stretchier. I got a medium black tie dye. It's... Ok. I think this top would be great for someone with a leaner/thinner build. It billows out around the waist and just isn't flattering, but I can deal with it. It is a really awesome design, more like marble than tie dye.

reviewText: It's to small around the neck it shokes my daughter
I'm 5'7" with a small chest and ordered a size 2. It fits perfectly! It is slightly long, but nothing a pair of heels can't fix.

If you have a long torso, this is the swimsuit for you!  I guess if you have a short torso, it would work too. The ruching is not sewn, but is caused by elastic and the bunching up of a very long suit. I bought a Medium, based on other reviews, for my 11-year-old who is very square-shaped. It's cute and she loves the color. It does have padded cups, which I may cut out because she is only 11 and not in need of them. It fits her because it can bunch up in the middle.

If you are looking for plugs made of genuine semi-precious stone, keep looking. These are synthetic. The snowflake obsidian ones are the only ones that look real. Both the jasper ones look fake at first glance. I can tell the obsidian are definitely synthetic as well, because they are so lightweight. With all of this said, I will admit that the fit is perfect. The flare is pretty wide, but the saddles fit perfectly if you can get them in alright. If your ears are still healing from a recent stretch or are just not very elastic, you could have trouble getting them in. One nice feature of these is how wide they are. A lot of stone plugs have thin saddles and sit almost flush with your ear or fall out easily because of it. These are nice and wide (long? whatever), so your lobes will have plenty of room, no matter how fat they are. If you are okay with a wide flare and synthetic stone, then this is a decent pack of plugs. However, if you are like me and want the quality and weight of genuine stone, you should shop elsewhere.

Some were BIAGIO  and the others were Cielo but they all were good quality. I will be ordering them in more colors in the future. I was so excited about them that I showed a friend of mine who had ordered cardigans from a website that sold "one-size fits all" for only $7. If I could give NO stars and a warning to everyone out there, DO NOT buy from this company! Very sub par. I'm surprised they are allowed t sell on Amazon. False advertising in a sense. Never show the front of this sweatshirt, never states what the front looks like. How hard would it be to say, "plain front"?! But when I went to return it, they would not refund my money initially, pointing out that the other sweatshirt given as an example of what other people ordered (and had small numbers on the left front chest), was from another company. It was from their own company!! American Tee Co. My husband could find no info on this company, but they said they charged a 15% restocking fee. A $26 item less 15% should be $22.10, but I only got back $18.53. Also had to pay for return shipping. So in all, I paid over $12 with nothing to show for it.

4 stars because it suits my needs well. I bought this mostly to round out my Indiana Jones costume. It's an essential part. Only downside there is that this bag is a darker green than the one he uses which is a more traditional, light olive canvas color.

Besides that the size is great. Most genuine British WWII gas mask bags (like Indy's) don't have leather straps. The one he used was modified and although this bag'a strap isn't genuine leather, it gets the look right for sure.

I like that the bag has modern pockets inside which will make the bag extra handy.

It's not 100% as close to the real thing as I would like, but for the price it does the trick. It probably wouldn't have cost too much more to buy the right bag, leather strap and assemble it, but this was much more convenient.

I like it! It's roomy, it looks good (a little too good, but I'll fix that. Only gave 4 stars because I'm not 100% sure that the strap is real leather, but it's leather enough for my purpose. If you are going to use this as a costume piece, make sure you get it in enough time to weather it a bit!
The brass ring attached to strap rust !! It is not made of brass.

This is the real deal!!! I was cautious about ordering from overseas but did the research and put in the order for this part of my Indiana Jones outfit. I always knew too, that I could trust the Amazon return policy if I didn't think it held up to my lax standards of how it would fit the look with the outfit. Boy, did it ever fit!! It is perfect!! The studios must have ordered same exact style when you see this and compare when watching the Indiana Jones movies. Strap is there, brass buttons are there, it is olive green canvas, and the strap rings are there too just like in the movie.
  It is a big part of the outfit and is now checked off the list. Spend the bucks for this one, you will not be disappointed!! I thank the originating store for having this available and for Amazon for putting it on their site and making it so fast and easy to get!! Comicon, here I come!!

When the watch needs to be wound, the whole mechanism spins rather than the watch just winding. Each time I bring it back and they swap it for a new one which works for a while before it all starts again.
Luckily there is a two year warranty so I will be back getting it swapped again. When it happened the first time I figured it was just a bad copy but as it happens over and over, I suspect it is a major design flaw. Whatever they did to get the price so low for an automatic they did at the expense of reliability.

reviewText:
The dress looks exactly like the photo. The color is a vibrant wine red. The color of the liner, zipper, and dress are the same, and the liner is short enough that it doesn't show in the leg slit. Mine came in a bit too large (maybe a size 12ish/38C. I usually wear an 8/36B.), but I contacted the seller, and they were quick to make it right(I emailed them the day I got the dress, and we had it all figured out two days later). Also, I should mention that I got the dress 9 days sooner than I expected it. Crazy-speedy delivery! I will definitely buy from SheIn again.

Only one word of caution. The dress is very long (I'm 5'9" and about 150, so this is a new experience for me). Unless you are 6' and expecting to wear heels, you'll need to get this hemmed or it will drag on the floor. Make sure you order with enough time to get it hemmed!

I absolutely love these. They are extremely comfortable and super cute. They work exactly what I got them for and they were delivered faster than the estimated delivery date.

Although these are certainly fashionable, I wear mine for a more practical use. Because of some health problems I have, I often have a lot of muscle pain, especially in my hands and arms. I out these on when I am using pain sprays or when I apply Lidocaine patches to my hands or arms. They help keep the patches in place and the edges don't roll or peel. I often wear compression or Tommie Copper gloves on my hands and these add an extra layer of warmth and keep the gloves in place.

There is room for your thumb to fit through and this keeps these long "gloves" in place and they come about 3" above my elbow. They look extremely thin in width when they first come out of the package. However, they easily stretch to the size of your arm. As a woman in my 40's, I needed to make sure I got a pair that just weren't for super skinny teenagers! I am 5'5" tall and weigh about 140 pounds and do realize that they probably aren't for everyone, especially if you tend to have larger forearms. They have a cable knit texture and are quite soft. My skin can be very delicate and I can wear these when the slightest touch can be too much. They wash well and come back to their original shape after drying. I don't do any thing special when cleaning them.

reviewText: Beautiful top

What a beautiful, sophisticated top!  I ordered the dark blue top in US size 14.  I'm 5'8", my measurements are 39-32-42, bra 34C, shirt size is usually large or 12.  Since this was coming from Asia, I ordered one size up, so a 14.  The fit is perfect! The quality of the lace is very nice & soft.  The lining of this top is sown in at the sides & tacked at the top edge so that the lining sits straight & flat.  The lining is stretchy, thin but not see through, & comfortable.  Also, at the bottom hem, the lining is about 4" shorter than the lace.  The top edge of the lace must be cut from a larger sheet, & there are a few threads that should have been trimmed away better but weren't.  No problem, I will rectify that with a quick snip of my scissors.  The stitching on this top is straight & fine.

All in all, this top was a great purchase!  I've seen similar tops sold that ship from the US, but were more than twice the price.  I'm happy that I decided to be patient & spend less money.  The top was delivered one month ahead of the shipping schedule, so that was a very nice surprise!

reviewText: I love the purse. It's bigger than what I realized it would be even after using a measuring tape against another purse I have. This works out perfectly for me. I feel the quality of the purse is high. It's heavy, though. I'm sure that's due to the materials used in making it anti-theft. I like that I don't have to carry a wallet and the flashlight is awesome.

I loved everything about this bag except for the color.  On my monitor, the colors looked gray and black.  When I received it, it was much more beige.  I exchanged it for the black hobo.  It's a terrific bag and I'll feel secure traveling with it in Italy.  It's not too large for me (I am petite) and yet  it is very spacious.
This is my second one I have bought. Love the size, pockets straps and inside.  Love that it is light weight.  The perfect bag plus it is identity theft protected.  What more could you ask for.

Travelon bags are absolutely THE BEST bags for traveling safely! They protect you in five ways:

1. interior steel mesh - between the exterior of the bag and the inner lining - that prevents slash-and-grab thefts
2. straps are reinforced with steel cable to prevent them from being cut by thieves
3. two of the external zippers on this bag have locking latches so pickpockets can't unzip them in a hurry
4. the strap has a hinged, split ring that unlocks so you can remove and weave the strap through your chair, shopping cart, etc.
5. Maybe most importantly, the back compartment, with slots for your credit cards, passport, and cash, is RFID protected so that they can't be scanned by thieves who can steal your personal information. Electronic pickpockets are on the rise, and this bag will protect you from it!

The bag has two front pockets with magnetic closures, a roomy back zippered pocket with credit card, cash and passport pockets and a zippered pocket for change or other small items.  There are two side pockets, useful for keys, sunglasses, or even a water bottle.  The main zippered compartment is extra roomy and has two slip pockets and a large zippered pocket.

Finally, this bag is beautiful and well made! I'm a Coach addict, so I'm used to having only top quality bags. This bag, though not leather, is very high quality and attractive. I feel great when I carry it, so I've been using it even when I'm not traveling, and I've already ordered another bag from Travelon.

If I could give this bag six stars, I would!
If you're a traveler, do yourself a favor and look into Travelon products.
summary: THE best travel bags are from Travelon!

Note:  You don't need RFID protection unless you carry one of the cards that actually transmits a signal rather than using a chip.  The little gold chips on your cards don't transmit a signal.  They are read by a chip reader inside the device you insert them into.  Unless someone is able to take our your card without you knowing, insert it into a chip reader, then replace it in your purse without you knowing, you're okay.

RFID protection: Just more fear-based Capitalism used to make you think you need to buy something you don't need.
summary: Well-Built, Worth the Peace of Mind

reviewText:
I purchased this bag in preparation for a trip to a place where pickpocketing is common. Fortunately, I cannot review its "anti-theft" properties fully. However, I can say that this bag held everything I needed to carry with me on day trips from the place we were staying, and also it was great for air travel.

The bag has a back pocket which is lined with an RFID-protective material, which also has a clasp to keep the zipper closed. That pocket has smaller pockets for credit cards as well. I was able to fit four passports, as well as our printed travel plans (8.5" x 11") folded in half in that pocket. In the main compartment of the bag, I had enough room for two smaller journals, my phone, external phone battery and USB charging cable, business cards, an e-reader, pens, pencils, mints, and my Sony a-6000 interchangeable lens camera with the smaller lens attached. In the small pocket, I had an array of emergency medicine, earbuds, and lip moisturizer. With all of these things in the main pocket, I was still able to zip the purse closed when necessary and the additional clasp held the zipper in place. The two front pockets close by magnet, but are the perfect size to hold a Travelon RFID-blocking wallet. Because of the shape (the pocket is tapered at the top), it would be difficult to pick the wallet from the pocket, unless you're the one wearing the bag. I used the two side pockets to hold a few water bottles a lot of the time, as our destinations were quite warm.

I like the wider bottom on this bag, and it is a quality I usually seek out in my purses/bags as I hate having the contents of my purse empty out on the floor when I am at a restaurant, a theater, or in my car.

Most of the time when we were traveling, I wore the bag across my body, and the strap adjusted well enough that it fit comfortably. Two things I don't like about this bag:  the nylon (?) fabric is fairly slippery, and so wearing it on just one shoulder doesn't feel secure at all. It wants to slip right off. Also, I thought it would be big enough to carry my oversized tablet in the main compartment with my other stuff, so I could use it as a purse and carry-on bag for the airplane, but it needs to be about 1" taller for that.

Despite those two little issues, I am very happy with this bag.
summary: Good cross-body anti-tip bag with secure pockets for travel

reviewText: As an earlier reviewer mentioned, the two pockets are sewn so tightly that it is difficult to put anything in them.  So, as she suggested, I removed a bit of the stitching. reviewText:
This bathing cap is fun, retro and effective. I felt like the cap was a little tight around the edges. My daughter loves it and is not bothered by it at all.  I honestly think it was my hair bump that changed the fit. It is easy to get off and on, and the molded floral is really neat looking.
I received this product at a discount or for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a great retro remake of a swim cap!

I have one that was my grandmother's made of a thin rubber that is pretty badly aged now. This allows me to still continue with my vintage fun without worrying about losing something from my grandma.

The color is a nice lilac purple. It doesn't fit super snug against the head, which is nice for my hair, but the edge does have a super grip ridge on it that should  keep it from moving even if lap swimming.

The texture of it is a little rough, not as sleek or cite as the actual vintage cap I have, but seeing as how any molded cap is hard to find, I'm still happy to have it as is.

The seller promotes it as a cap for cancer patients losing their hair, and I do NOT recommend it for that! Knowing a few people who have undergone chemo,this would be itchy,  irritating, and hot and sweaty to try and wear as a head cover. Definitely opt for very lightweight cotton with no or natural dyes for that. I was given this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Fun for a vintage look at the pool

My daughter wears this cap when she swims.  She swims almost everyday during the summer, and her hair has been damaged in the past from sun and chlorine exposure.  Her hair is just past her shoulders, and she is able to tuck it in the cap.  The cap keeps her hair mostly dry, and I feel good knowing her hair is protected while she swims. We ordered the purple cap, and the color is really fun.  I love the retro look of the flowers on the cap, and she gets a lot of compliments on it.  This cap covers her hair, ears, and part of her forehead.  It is relatively easy to put on, and appears to have been made well!

** Received this products at a discount prized for trial...

First, the not so great stuff about these work out pants. I ordered a large in this size as I typically wear a medium or large at a store such as Forever21. When I pulled these out of the packaging, holy cow.....they definitely run small. I didn't think at first that they would fit, I was kind of scared to even try to put them on. Much to my shock, I was able to get them on and not only that but they were rather comfortable! However, since the product is super stretchy, that means it sheers out when it expands. You definitely couldn't see anything but I know I would want more of a barrier between me and that creepy guy who stares at me at the gym. However, for yoga at home or to sleep, they were great. The other not so great thing was that they were sort of short. For me, this is no problem. I am 5' 2'' and these landed just at my ankle bone. I am used to pants bunching up a bit, so a short length worked well for me. However, I would say if you are anything about 5' 3'', these might start turning into capris for you. I know the title of the clothing says capri, but it shows a full length pant.

Other than that, it was a very comfortable product. It was super comfy on, the material is soft (if not a little thin), and I am happy with my purchase. Just keep in mind that they DO run quite small. I received a discount for my honest review and this is truly my experience with these pants.
summary: the not so great stuff about these work out pants

This wig is amazing! I only paid $10 and I am so pleased with my purchase! It showed up exactly on time which made me happy since I needed it for a cosplay happening on a deadline. It is a bit more blue then on the computer screen where it looks a bit more green but it still worked perfectly for my cosplay. When I opened it I noticed it came with a wig cap as a bonus! The wig is very long, it comes down a little past my waist. The fibers are very thick and were a bit tangled when I pulled it out of the packaging but for a wig this long you would expect that. It has very silky fibers also, so with a wide tooth comb I was able to work them out very easily without much hair fallout. It has a nice shine to it as well, not a fake one you would expect from this color either. I wore it out in public and people thought I had dyed my hair and got extensions. I cannot wait to complete my cosplay and take some good pictures in it! Best $10 wig you can get!

reviewText:
I really enjoy shirts with interesting details and the details in this shirt are very true to the pictures. I ordered this shirt in light blue. The material is lightweight, yet substantial enough to wear without a t-shirt underneath. The seams inside are well finished.

As noted by the seller, the sizes run significantly smaller than their US counterparts so you'll want to measure carefully and plan ahead. Here are the measurements from the 4XL I ordered in case you're wondering about size.

Shoulders (seam to seam): 20.75"
Chest (armpit to armpit): 22.25" or 44.5" when doubled
Sleeve (top shoulder seam to end of cuff): 26"
Length (top of collar to bottom of shirt hem): 31"
summary: Great Details, Good Construction, Be Aware of Size

I bought this bag because I was looking for a lightweight bag for travel.  This is a wonderful bag.  It has a good size main zippered compartment which held my many items I like to carry.  The side zipper compartment easily held my boarding passes and cell phone.  The smaller pockets are useful for small items such as chapstick, business cards, etc.  There are RFID pockets built into the side of the inside of the bag.  I did not use these because I already own a Travelon RFID wallet which I carried with me.  I purchased the black and the lining inside is a very colorful print.
Also, I was caught in a rainstorm and this bag does not get wet due to the heavy duty fabric it is made of.  It is also very lightweight and the strap can be used as a crossbody or shoulder strap.  I like this bag so much that I am planning on buying another one in a lighter color for the warmer weather. If you are looking for a bag that is not too big yet not so small that it doesn't hold anthing, then this is the bag for you!

I wear tank tops under everything so this would be very comfortable to wear even in the summer.  The seams are simple with a long seam running the entire length of the back, from neck to tail.

Overall, if you get the fit right with the proper size, add a scarf or a long necklace and wear something to conceal your undergarments this is not a bad top.  This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText: I love this scarf.  It keeps me so warm in the winter, and it is gorgeous when I wear it for fashion.  I have had many compliments on this scarf.  I recommend it highly.

I'm so happy I decided to buy this scarf! I've been eyeballing this one for quite some time now, but hesitated, as I know sometimes those "honest reviews" aren't so honest. I was also worried it would be itchy--I have sensitive skin so even slightly rough textures irritate me--but it's not. It has virtually no prickly feeling whatsoever... and I like to have my scarves nicely tucked up against my neck! The colors are as vibrant in the photos too. It's not a thin material, so it's rather poofy when you wrap it up around your neck. I've been looking for a perfect blanket scarf and this is it. My only gripe about it is that the threads pull really easily, so you have to be extra careful with it. However, I've washed it several times now (with like materials) and it's still looking like new. Doesn't shed or anything either, which is nice. So glad I bought this scarf.

Love this scarf! I actually use it more like a shawl, because of the size and shape. Or it can hang down like a scarf but not wrap around because then it's just too poofy for me. Others may like it that way though! It would be nice wrapped under a peacoat on a really cold day! But I prefer to just wear it with a sweater as an accessory. :)

The fabric is soft, and the colors are perfect. This scarf is so versatile, it will go with a lot of outfits!

My only complaint is that it will pull a little if you aren't careful. Otherwise, I would definitely recommend it!

I received this product for a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I am absolutely in love with this blanket scarf. I kept seeing all of these ads for them and I had to add this to my scarf addiction. I usually wear infinity scarves, but this blanket scarf is my new favorite. It's softer than I expected. It's a huge scarf that can double as a blanket. I like the colors and they match a lot of outfits. The only negative thing is that my ring has caught the thread and its snagged it, but I easily fixed it by pulling the thread and it was fine. I have gotten so many compliments so far.
 I received this scarf at a discounted price, not free, in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: In love with my new blanket scarf

The Naviforce Sports Watch is very large and thick.  The overall watch is fine but the electronic LCD display is poor.  Does not appear as shown in the picture that is on the website!  It is very difficult to see...even in dim light.  The lighted feature only stays on for three seconds which is barely enough time to focus on what you are trying to see.  There is a row of days displayed, and (even if set correctly...also difficult with the instructions provided) it is virtually impossible to tell which day is being highlighted.  The alarm apparently sounds out the back of the watch, so if it is on your wrist, it is not loud enough to wake you up.  Perhaps, it is designed only to be a reminder for a person who is already awake.  The pins in the band were very difficult to remove so as to remove links and adjust the band.  Again, more thorough instructions would have been helpful.  Considering the price, it is probably a great watch for the value, but I would want the displays brightened, and the instructions for setting all of the functions of the watch to have been more thorough.
summary: The overall watch is fine but the electronic LCD display is poor

reviewText: These are cute in person, but there are some problems. The legs are tight, not unreasonably so, but there is no stretch and a little give would be nice. Most maternity pants I've come across go over my entire belly, these come up to about my belly button, which is simply awkward but not necessarily a deal breaker. If I can figure out how to keep them up, they'll be worth it.

I didn't start wearing actual maternity clothing until about 6 months ago, so I thought at 4 months these wouldn't be an issue.  However, since the pants do come from over seas, they run extremely small.  I measured myself and ordered up from the suggested size chart and still couldn't get them up over my legs.  The quality looked well made, but these would probably only work for a very small framed pregnant woman, or someone not pregnant.

reviewText: I'm still waiting to hear back from the company who sells these. But I was very disappointed with these pants. First of all, they are not leggings...they are pants made out of almost jean-like material. Second of all, the pair I received was black, not navy. Third of all, the paneling is not as pictured. It's almost like a band of sweat pant material on the front only. Fourth of all, these have ZERO hold up capacity. They're like pants for humpty dumpty...you should expect a great fall down with these pants because there's no elastic to hold them up. Fifth of all, these are LOW RIDING pants, which is VERY PROBLEMATIC for an 8 month pregnant woman. I feel like they were trying to save on cost by using less material. These had the potential for SUCH cuteness, but instead were SUCH a disappointment. I still would like a refund for the false advertisement of these pants. I've contacted the Chinese based company as I shared, but have not heard back.
summary: Poorly made, TERRIBLE Maternity Fit, Not Right Color and Not Right Material

I've been on the fence with these pants for a while.  I finally wore these for a run the other day and was pleasantly surprised.  Prior to this I had just lounged around the house with them.  The fit is good and they are just the right thickness for running in cool weather.  I wouldn't recommend these for cold weather but they did fine in below 50 degree temps.  My only real difficulty with these is how loose they are at the ankles.  From mid calf on up they have great compression (not enough for medical purposes but great for staying in place and keeping the material from shifting) but below that they are so loose that they just hang there...almost to the point of being uncomfortable. I did have to add a drawstring since the waist is very loose as well but that is typical for pants of this style....not sure why all manufacturers don't automatically add a drawstring.  I've only worn these to run or while lounging around the house so I can't speak to their fit during other types of exercise.  The color scheme is nice but the panels don't really add any value to them for exercise purposes.  In general the loose ankles and the need to add the drawstring keep these from being 5 star pants.  However, for the price point (get them when they drop to about 20 bucks) you can't really go wrong.

Overall, this is a pretty nice polo shirt. The material is excellent  decently thick but still very soft. The stitch quality is excellent  tight seams throughout, and zero loose or pulled threads. The collar is firm enough to hold its shape well without being rough on my neck. I really like that it comes with an extra button (its sewn onto the care tag). Thats a feature you don't often see these days.

The cut is on the relaxed side. I have it in large and, while I would not call it baggy, its certainly not a trim or fitted cut. That works fine for this shirt since polo shirts are casual wear by design.  I have it in gray, and the color is a nice, medium gray that looks very similar to the color depicted in the product listing.

The one area where the cut could be improved is the sleeves. They are cut really wide which in and of itself is not bad, but they also have a cuffed hem on them. The wide cut would look better without a cuffed hem (or, conversely, a tighter cut with the cuffed hem).

Other than that issue, zero complaints. Its a nice shirt thats priced well for what you get.

reviewText: A great boot to keep me warm during snow removal in the winter.

I have to admit I was a bit skeptical on whether or not these boots would be any good. For the price I figured I would give them a try. I am glad I did. I did a winter camp this last weekend up north and I was very happy with them. Temps were only in the 20's but I am confident these would be good to well below those temps. The nice thing is the liners easily pull out and I put those inside my sleeping bag and had toasty warm liners to put on in the morning and they slid easily back into the boots from the hammock. I wore them with snowshoes and had no issues. I think a great value for the price!!
3 stars because of slow shipping. Product was as advertised. Seems to be high quality

Wore mukluks identical to these on the Plattsburgh AFB flight line just south of the Canadian border in the 70s. Worked great down to 10 deg but colder than that, and it often did get colder, they struggled to keep my feet warm even with liners. That's when I put on the "bunny boots". If you don't live in the north tundra these will serve you very well. As stated they are not water proof.

I sometimes have to lift boxes where my holder can get stuck in-between them but this thing is very well made so I don't have to worry about breaking it.  My coworkers on the other hand, end up breaking their's all the time and lose their cards.  The detachable clip is also useful for quickly taking my badge off to swipe my Metro card.

reviewText: Finally!!!! Finally I receive an article of clothing, made of good quality material, that fits EXACTLY like I wanted it to. Not only is it comfortable but it looks great & makes me look great. I'm 5'1" 140 pounds & I ordered the XL as I have a bit of stomach pooch that I'm very self conscience about. This shirt hides it perfectly without it looking like I'm purposely trying to hide an unflattering body part. I also often worry about the crotch area of jeans & things that I wear & this covers/hides this area perfectly too, also without looking like you're purposely trying to hide something. It fits loose enough to be comfortable without looking baggy or that it's "too big for you", but at the same time fitting "just right" enough that you don't look like you've stuffed yourself into something too small for you. The quality of the material is perfect. It's just right in that it's thin enough so as not to be the heaviness of a heavy sweatshirt & you could choose to wear a tank top under it if you wanted too but also just right in thick enough that you don't have to wear a tank top under it if you don't want to and you'd still be just fine without feeling uncomfortable and or too chilly. I love it so much I just went back on the website & bought it in the other colors they have. It's rare for me to find clothing that is all of the above so when something is really really good I like to have more of it & I want to let others know because shopping online is such a gamble in what you're getting. If they had this in more colors, I'd buy more. You won't be disappointed.

I had not heard of Liebeskind, but I ordered this bag on a whim because it seemed like a great deal on a cool, well constructed, leather bag. This bag is amazing. The leather is high quality and soft. The bag is large, with an inside zipper pocket on one side, and open slip pockets to keep things organized, and a zipper pocket on the back side of the bag. The cross body strap is sturdy and long, so the bag hugs my hip and the top of my thigh. It is super comfortable to wear. The shoulder strap is plenty long enough to use as a proper shoulder/ bucket bag when you just want to sling it over your shoulder. The outside pockets are roomy, with magnet snaps. I have a 10 month old baby, and I carry snacks, baby spoons, diapers and wipes, and all sorts of stuff, and can keep it pretty organized in this bag. This is like...my end of the world bag, if I could just take one to carry...this would be it. I am a Liebeskind fan forever now.

reviewText: This is my second one of these wallets.  The strap on the first one is ripping due to high use over the last 4-5 years!  I bought the first one when I was travelling for work all the time and it made it convenient at the airport, hotel, and rental car counters.  I love love love it!  I get more complements and curiosity about it.  And I love being able to express myself with color - plus I can actually see it inside my purse.  It holds my drivers license, debit card, 3 most-frequently used credit cards, auto club, Costco, medical insurance, and Good Sam cards - these are the ones I need to hand the most.  I don't carry money in the zipper pocket, but I do carry all of my punch cards for coffee stands and stores that I frequent so that they are handy.  I still carry a regular wallet for my cash, checkbook, coupons, and credit cards that I don't use as frequently, such as store cards - Macy's, Sears, and the like.  But unless I'm using cash, I hardly ever have to get the wallet out of my purse.  I see that other companies make a similar credit card case wallet, but this one has 8 slots and the others have only 5 or 6 and wouldn't work for me.

Pros:

Cons:
Material is a bit thin

Other Thoughts:
The description doesn't mention it but the shirt I received is 65% poly / 35% cotton and is tagged dry clean only.  My guess is the manufacturer tagged it dry clean only because the material is a bit thin and the construction won't hold up to too many washings.  That said, I'm planning to wash it at home anyway since it smells a bit stale.  I normally wear a medium but I wanted to make sure this shirt wasn't too tight so I ordered a large and it was a good thing I did.  The large fits well.  A little loose but not too baggy.
summary: a nice looking pirate shirt but a bit thin

I am an exact 34 waist and the XL fits me perfectly so  BELIEVE THE CHART. They are very stretchy and I would say that the XL would easily fit waist sizes 33-35. The single layer pouch in front is ample and I believe it would fit almost anyone out there unless you are really huge.  The elastic in the waist fits up higher on the hips than other bikini underwear, which is nice, and is plenty tight enough so they don't slip down like some others I have tried. The front fits low, but there is still plenty of back coverage.  I purchased these for travel because they take up little to no space in my suitcase compared to my boxers, and they dry really quickly if I need to wash them out. After wearing them for awhile I am finding them to be a lot more comfortable than my boxers.  I thought it would take some time to get used to these because of the smaller bikini cut, but these are so comfortable you hardly know you are wearing them at all. I actually like them so much that I have just ordered 6 more pair.
summary: Very comfortable, but believe the chart, I am a 34 waist and the XL fits perfect.

I'm getting SO sick of ordering clothes, following the size charts that the SELLER lists and having something show up sized for children! I ordered these in a medium as the size chart said med would be a size 8u.s. (I actually only wear a 2-4 but I understand about the difference in Asian and u.s. sizing and I wanted to be SURE this would fit.  It did not)once again I received am item only a kid could even attempt to put on.  This IS NOT a case of"stupid, fat American didn't read size chart" but this IS a case of "I don't really care enough to do it right" in my opinion.  If you are going to risk it with these, I would go ahead and order the x large and that's only if you are actually a size 0-2 or you'll just be bummed out like me. ..

reviewText:
I'm a Whovian. This necklace is adorable and I enjoy it. There are some issues to address though. The photograph posted by the seller appears to be of a nice piece of which this is a cheap imitation. The original photo shows very smooth and shiny metal while mine is not as shiny and also has pitted metal marks from the casting. The original picture also has the obvious and preferred TARDIS Blue in the squares, mine has a dark muted blue. The original picture has one panel that is not blue to represent the information placard, all my panels are blue. Another note is that I believe the "C" curve of the necklace would be more attractive as a solid shiny piece as opposed to having the blue square print on the exterior side.

Notes about the necklace. The charm is a little over an inch in length. It is heavy for a necklace (weighing in a .75 of an ounce) but not heavy enough to be burdensome. The TARDIS does spin, which made me very happy. Some reviewer commented that it gets stuck, mine does get hung up occasionally (not with every rotation) but it can be pushed through and continuously spun.

Overall I'm happy with the necklace. It is a good piece, but not fine jewelry. I recommend it to serious Whovians.

I received this necklace at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I formed my opinions and wrote this review as if I had paid full price.
summary: Not as nice as pictured product

A really beautiful dress. I have 4 MayriDresses (this one, Peacock, Tree Branches, and Blue floral) and this one is my favorite. Fit is very comfortable, though if you have a large bust the bodice isn't the most flattering style (the undefined squareness of it kind of makes your chest look like you've got bread box stuffed underneath), but it is stretchy so can easily accommodate a bigger bustline. The length may be a problem for some. I'm 5'9" and in bare feet it touches the floor to pool with about an inch still to go - in 1" heels it skims the floor - which I actually really like, a 2" heel would probably be the safest to eliminate a possible tripping hazard but I can't really do more than a 1" heel. I'd definitely have a tripping issue in flats though, so take that into consideration. I thought about cutting and hemming it, but chiffon frays like crazy if it's cut and I'm fine wearing it with the 1" heel. Excellent workmanship, it really is a very pretty dress and manages to be both casual and dressy. It's chiffon so it's sheer but there is a white under lining (no matter what color the outer dress is) that ends approx mid-calf and I haven't found it to be immodest at all. If you're tall - 5'10" up, you'll be delirious to finally find a maxi dress that goes past your ankles.

The leather on my first pair was soft and scuffed easy , but they are for work and these are the good ones for less than a  hundred bucks . Ordered half size larger to have in cold weather and wear an extra sock . Liners are thick so they could be taken out if need be or add an extra liner if want to wear thin sock . Is this enough review on something as simple as a boot ? I have given boots away in the past that is to heavy or just never felt good . Will probably buy another pair or two of these before they discontinue this just because that happened in the past with some Rockys that I had that wore out till they fell off my feet from being worn out . Glad that I could buy this pair really cheap , because I myself am very conservative to the point of being cheap and thrifty . So now I am done bragging about this pair of mud stompers and hope you enjoy any and all reviews you read in the future as much as this one . Respectfully , A South Dakota farmer rancher and pilot of powered parachutes , husband and father .

reviewText:
I have to admit, I am disappointed in this shirt, especially for the price.
I am a huge Game of Thrones fan and was so excited to get this shirt to reveal my pregnancy with twins. I got a 2XL (I usually wear an XL), figuring that I would certainly grow into it if it was too big. It wasn't. In fact, I'm 17 weeks, and I don't see this fitting me more than another month or so.
But my biggest complaint is that the shirt itself was sewn unevenly. The sleeves do not align with the ruching on the sides. Because of this, when the logo was printed, it was aligned with the sleeves...so it ended up being off-center with my growing belly.
I felt like I was tugging at the shirt all day. On top of that, the neck hole seemed smaller than normal t-shirts and the shirt itself, while a soft material, picked up a lot of lint. Crazy Dog seems like a great company, and they have some really cool shirts, but I doubt I will purchase from them again.

I liked it so much that I just purchased the same in black.  A note on the black: unlike many other unembellished black hats which appear funerary, this one with pearl embellishment is fun and stylish for cocktails.  True to photograph. reviewText:
I bought this necklace for my best friends upcoming birthday. She is going to school to become a dental hygienist and it has been intense. Even though she isn't working right now and school is the only thing that she is focusing on currently, it has been tough. Every time I talk to her she seems to be consuming some kind of caffeine to help fuel her late night, early morning study sessions. She has taken a lot of chemistry and biology classes and I know that she will appreciate the slightly nerdy nature of this necklace.

This necklace arrived promptly and in a small felt jewelry pouch. I was a bit bemused to find that it was inside, not one, not two, but three little plastic bags. I still haven't figured out why it needed so many. The necklace looked to be a bit more yellowy than it did in the product description photos. Not by much, but enough that I noticed. This might bother me more than it would other people because I am not personally a fan of yellow gold, it looks atrocious on me, but keep that in mind if the color of the gold is something that is really important to you or whomever you are purchasing this necklace for.

The molecule is really solid feeling and I think that it would have to be abused fairly spectacularly to bend or break. The chain that the molecule is on is very nice and dainty. I would like to add that I don't think it would be toddler or baby safe though. I think about jewelry this way ever since I had my daughter. She is now 2.5 and has learned to be careful when looking at mommys necklace or earrings, but it definitely wasn't that way early on, and even now she can accidentally be rougher than she means to be. This necklace, or rather I should say the chain of this necklace, would not survive a solid toddler tug, so keep that in mind if you are buying this for someone with small children.  The part of the chain that would be directly at the back of the wearers neck is slightly different from the rest of the chain. It has about 2 inches of larger, but not thicker, gold chain than the rest of the necklace. I don't think that this should be an issue because the fixed nature of the pendant should ensure that the back of the necklace won't inch around to the front like chains that have loose pendants tend to.

My one big complaint is that I wish it had better packaging. The felt bag is okayish as far as presentation goes, but I wish it came in a box or had something like a little card that explained what the necklace is. I suppose this wouldnt be an issue if you were giving this to a chemistry major, but most of us have slept since chemistry class. I certainly don't recall the precise molecular structure for caffeine, or anything else for that matter. Maybe this just bothers me because I was an Advertising Design major and I feel that good packaging is at least half the battle in designing a good product, but I really think that a nice instructional card and gift box could take this to a higher level.

Overall, I think that this is a lovely necklace and I definitely recommend it. I am considering by either the rose gold or the rhodium plated silver serotonin molecule for myself some time. I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Photo Note: I will have my friend send me a picture of her wearing the necklace once I give it to her in about a month, and please excuse the cat hair on my necklace display. No matter how hard I try to keep it hair free I have three cats and the fabric the display has on it is like a freaking magnet for any kind of hair, and it doesnt like to come off.  And grr! My photos keep uploading sideways. I don't know how this happens and I can't seem to fix it! If anyone can tell me how I can fix it or keep it from happening in the first place, please tell me in the comments. It drives me up the wall.
summary: Necklace is awesome, but I wish the presentation was better!

reviewText:
I am a science nerd so I have been collecting these pieces of jewelry that are molecules. My Dopamine and Serotonin necklaces are both silver and I wish that I had gotten this one in silver as well but that is ok. I actually don't drink caffeine anymore so I think I will be gifting this to a friend who manages a Starbucks. The quality on this is nice and the chain feels sturdy. I like that if you aren't a big nerd it just looks like an abstract art piece but for those who recognize it it is a great conversation starter! I would recommend this to any caffeine lover for sure!

I did receive this item at a reduced price in exchange for an honest review. All opinions expressed are derived either from my own experiences or those of a family member or friend who used the product themselves. There are no incentives for giving five star or only positive reviews, so please don't worry that I am giving a biased account of my experience with a product. I use reviews from other customers as a tool to decide which products I purchase myself and I have been burnt in the past by buying items that had glowing reviews and they turned out to be highly biased or just for the sake of getting a free or cheap product (and thus the product, the seller or both turned out to be terrible). I don't want to waste my money and I don't want you to waste yours either!

If you found this review helpful please click that little "Yes" button down below, it helps me out a lot! Thank you!
summary: This satisfies my nerdy side and my girly side at once!

very comfortable

I just want to start off by saying that I absolutely love the clothing by Jiqiuguer and Outline (sister companies). Their clothes are fun and quirky and wonderfully comfortable! It is within the last three months that I have discovered the absolute joy of wearing this oversized clothing! I love it, love it, love it! Not only is the clothing very unique, but it is well crafted. I have yet to find any flaws in the garments - not even a loose string - and I have purchased at least a dozen of their garments.

I've done a lot of shopping of their clothing for summer-weight garb, but it was time to start thinking about fall rolling in, so I purchased this neat quilted top.  I purchased this in blue, and the color is gorgeous!  This top is so warm and snuggly and cute! Not only does it look fabulous with loose pants (like those featured on the model), but it will look great with jeans!  The fabric on this top is very soft inside and out. The bottom of the top has a neat detail of some extra fabric hanging out, that is a bit uneven.  It really just adds a bit of subtle flair to this top.  The applique on the front is sewn on very well.  When I inspected it, I couldn't see any places that would come off, fold, or be problematic.  The sleeves came to just above my wrists, and the bottom came to right above my hips.  It is a wide boxy fit.  The fabric has enough softness and movement that you don't end up looking like you are wearing a cube, though.  This top will be very warm and cozy all winter!

I am 5'3" and 130 pounds, usually wearing US size 4 / small. I ordered the small in this top, and it is perfect. When you are buying these clothes, always read the size charts provided by the company in the garment details section. I have some of their clothes in a small, medium, and large. I am always careful when ordering clothing online, especially Asian sized clothing, and order up. Because this top is supposed to be large on you, I was not worried about getting them too large. I feel like in clothing that is supposed to be huge and flowy like these, too big is okay. The measurements of the fabric are true, so you can make an accurate judgement as to what size to order. Don't just assume a size, and you'll be happy every time!

I love the detail work on this top! The applique, the quilting, the notched collar, and the fabric trim at the bottom of the top all add up to a fall / winter weight top that is really neat! I really love that this top, as well as their other garments, is made with quality fabric. These garments have a high price point, but you are definitely getting your money's worth. These clothes will last for a long time!

I enjoy wearing clothes that have some sort of fun pizzazz to them - something others don't own, and can't be bought at the mall. This top definitely fits that bill!  This also looks cute over a loose longer dress, over a T-shirt, with long or short skirts, and a variety of pants. Very versatile!

I have included some pictures of how the top fits, include a more close up selfie, so you can see the applique work and the color.

I know I am gushing over the clothes by this company, but I am not affiliated with them in any way.  I just really really love their clothing!  This top is fabulous!  Five stars!
summary: I love the detail work on this top! This top will be very warm and cozy all winter

reviewText: Missing some buttons, but otherwise love it!

I was so looking forward to trying this skort.  I'm a 4'11", 88lbs lady and can only fit into girl's size 10 or 12.  Was hoping this one would work, but to my disappointment, the the style is defeats the purpose of the skort.  There is just too much fabric overall that make up the skirt which creates this fluff out effect that instead of making one's hip slimmer, it makes the hip puffier and bigger. There were just too many folds, extra unnecessary fabric.
Also, the waist band is so thin that squeezes out your skin and any love handles in the waist area.  Very unattractive. They should make a tapered larger waist band to slim down the belly and abdominal area. Returning this item. Not worth $28.
summary: Makes your hip look even bigger!
